metadata.title: CVE-2022-43241 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Libde265 v1.0.8 was discovered to contain an unknown crash viaff_hevc_put_hevc_qpel_v_3_8_sse in sse-motion.cc. This vulnerability allowsattackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted video file.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
